Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, west of the Brunskid Trader's Guild.
Room.LongDescription: The Brunskid Trader's Guild is a notoriously dangerous place to do business, but the business can be quite profitable. The Guild is filled with thieves and assassins out to make a quick buck. To the distress of the city patrols, they have been unable to shut down this establishment.
